<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MVEGatherScatterLowering::isLegalTypeAndAlignment(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumElements,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><Highlight kind="normal">                                                       </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ElemSize,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><Highlight kind="normal">                                                       <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> Alignment) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (((NumElements == 4 &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="normal">        (ElemSize == 32 || ElemSize == 16 || ElemSize == 8)) ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><Highlight kind="normal">       (NumElements == 8 &amp;&amp; (ElemSize == 16 || ElemSize == 8)) ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><Highlight kind="normal">       (NumElements == 16 &amp;&amp; ElemSize == 8)) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><Highlight kind="normal">      Alignment &gt;= ElemSize / 8)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;masked gathers/scatters: instruction does not have &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><Highlight kind="normal">                    &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;valid alignment or vector type \\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184" lineLink="#a7381b9def2e711b7f83115e43247768d"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#a7381b9def2e711b7f83115e43247768d">checkOffsetSize</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Offsets, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> TargetElemCount) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Offsets that are not of type &lt;N x i32&gt; are sign extended by the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// getelementptr instruction, and MVE gathers/scatters treat the offset as</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// unsigned. Thus, if the element size is smaller than 32, we can only allow</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// positive offsets - i.e., the offsets are not allowed to be variables we</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// can&#39;t look into.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Additionally, &lt;N x i32&gt; offsets have to either originate from a zext of a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// vector with element types smaller or equal the type of the gather we&#39;re</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// looking at, or consist of constants that we can check are small enough</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to fit into the gather type.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Thus we check that 0 &lt; value &lt; 2^TargetElemSize.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> TargetElemSize = 128 / TargetElemCount;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> OffsetElemSize = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;FixedVectorType&gt;</a>(Offsets-&gt;getType())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><Highlight kind="normal">                                -&gt;getElementType()</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><Highlight kind="normal">                                -&gt;getScalarSizeInBits();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (OffsetElemSize != TargetElemSize || OffsetElemSize != 32) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constant">Constant</a> &#42;ConstOff = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;Constant&gt;</a>(Offsets);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!ConstOff)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><Highlight kind="normal">    int64&#95;t TargetElemMaxSize = (1ULL &lt;&lt; TargetElemSize);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CheckValueSize = &#91;TargetElemMaxSize&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;OffsetElem) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantint">ConstantInt</a> &#42;OConst = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;ConstantInt&gt;</a>(OffsetElem);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!OConst)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SExtValue = OConst-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantint/#aa8f4be0661aa64f5b1f20b15e93bb403">getSExtValue</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (SExtValue &gt;= TargetElemMaxSize || SExtValue &lt; 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;FixedVectorType&gt;</a>(ConstOff-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a0344a49526443edf90cc0aef3abd3337">getType</a>())) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> i = 0; i &lt; TargetElemCount; i++) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!CheckValueSize(ConstOff-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constant/#acd530d0571f320d47d37e7ae51cf70ff">getAggregateElement</a>(i)))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// elements.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/fixedvectortype">FixedVectorType</a> &#42;PtrTy = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;FixedVectorType&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/targetlibraryinfo-cpp/#aca185e6d0e9f423dbb24440206454872a11dbf501abf829b3ab7049c2d3a8a053">Ptr</a>-&gt;getType());</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00671" /><CodeLine lineNumber="671"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the input has been truncated, try to integrate that trunc into the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00672" /><CodeLine lineNumber="672"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// scatter instruction (we don&#39;t care about alignment here)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00673" /><CodeLine lineNumber="673"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/truncinst">TruncInst</a> &#42;Trunc = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;TruncInst&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/input">Input</a>)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00674" /><CodeLine lineNumber="674"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;PreTrunc = Trunc-&gt;getOperand(0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00675" /><CodeLine lineNumber="675"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;PreTruncTy = PreTrunc-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a0344a49526443edf90cc0aef3abd3337">getType</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00676" /><CodeLine lineNumber="676"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (PreTruncTy-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a833daf718a49c5cd637d8c9ddeaebe07">getPrimitiveSizeInBits</a>() == 128) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00677" /><CodeLine lineNumber="677"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/input">Input</a> = PreTrunc;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00678" /><CodeLine lineNumber="678"><Highlight kind="normal">      InputTy = PreTruncTy;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00679" /><CodeLine lineNumber="679"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00680" /><CodeLine lineNumber="680"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00681" /><CodeLine lineNumber="681"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ExtendInput = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00682" /><CodeLine lineNumber="682"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (InputTy-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a833daf718a49c5cd637d8c9ddeaebe07">getPrimitiveSizeInBits</a>() &lt; 128 &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00683" /><CodeLine lineNumber="683"><Highlight kind="normal">      InputTy-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a34ee40bb2f4f5ece47ef19e5f1f57e3c">isIntOrIntVectorTy</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00684" /><CodeLine lineNumber="684"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we can&#39;t find a trunc to incorporate into the instruction, create an</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00685" /><CodeLine lineNumber="685"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// implicit one with a zext, so that we can still create a scatter. We know</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00686" /><CodeLine lineNumber="686"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// that the input type is 4x/8x/16x and of type i8/i16/i32, so any type</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="687"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// smaller than 128 bits will divide evenly into a 128bit vector.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="688"><Highlight kind="normal">    InputTy = InputTy-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a83725435ece9bc12c40ceb34dbd1727c">getWithNewBitWidth</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00689" /><CodeLine lineNumber="689"><Highlight kind="normal">        128 / <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;FixedVectorType&gt;</a>(InputTy)-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/slpvectorizer-cpp/#a2f1d58ac35de4475017aca6c5bda6d44">getNumElements</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00690" /><CodeLine lineNumber="690"><Highlight kind="normal">    ExtendInput = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">true</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00691" /><CodeLine lineNumber="691"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;masked scatters: Small input type, will extend:\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00692" /><CodeLine lineNumber="692"><Highlight kind="normal">                      &lt;&lt; &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/input">Input</a> &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00693" /><CodeLine lineNumber="693"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00754" /><CodeLine lineNumber="754"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> TypeScale =</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="757"><Highlight kind="normal">                       <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;FixedVectorType&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncommongep-cpp/#ad532e8710e50302e0a376b61c91fa91d">GEP</a>-&gt;getType())-&gt;getNumElements());</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00760" /><CodeLine lineNumber="760"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
